page.title: 18Industry Around Inverbervie
page.content:
{Bruce Plant Ltd.}employ 55 men, they produce plastic boxes, they quarry material and do construction work. {R.M. Clark}employ 17 men and 6 women, they produce sausages, puddings, pies, sausage rolls and meat. {Highland Seafoods}employ 10 men and 70 women, they freeze prawns, crabs and salmon. {Wire Rope Services} employ 10 men and 2 women they produce wire rope slings. {Craigview Mills}employ 26 men and 19 women, they produce flax. {Nelson Cladding}employ 20 men and 1 woman, they produce roof cladding.
Most of those employed in these industries are local people.
